subj-group.subject: A Special Issue on Financial Engineering

title-group.article-title: Financial Engineering in Corporate Finance: An Overview

abstract.p: This introduction to the special issue provides an overview of financial engineering in corporate finance. It characterizes the process of financial innovation, describes the factors that stimulate financial innovation, and evaluates a variety of financial innovations within this framework in order to assess the sources of the value added by each.
